Message.Title: EBAY DOES NOT PRTECT SELLERS USING INTERNATIONAL FIRST CLASS MAIL
Message.Msg: Ebay just gave a non US customer a full refund after the customer claimed they didn't receive their item though the International first class mail tracking number shows the package was processed through the US Post Office. Ebay claims the package is not track-able??? This Ebay policy will result is a decline in sales as EBAY sellers will now be forced to either use a much more expensive "TRACK-ABLE" shipping service ( a turn-off for International buyers) or simply not ship to International addresses.
